summary: The customer was looking to downgrade their Contoso Wireless service from the unlimited data plan to the basic plan. The agent was able to provide the customer with a form that would help them to do this, as well as provide them with information about promotional packages that offer discounted rates on the unlimited data plan and a free or discounted TV. The agent recommended that if this option is of interest to the customer, they should act quickly as these packages are only available for a limited time.
